Class CustomizedFileServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomizedFileServiceLocal

    luis

      • notifyNewVersion

        public void notifyNewVersion(SystemAlert.Alerts alertType,
                    CustomizedFile customizedFile)
        Description copied from interface: CustomizedFileServiceLocal
        Notifies the new version of the customized file by creating/sending a system alert.
        Specified by:
        notifyNewVersion in interface CustomizedFileServiceLocal
        Parameters:
        alertType - can logically be one of:
        • SystemAlert.Alerts.NEW_VERSION_OF_APPLICATION_PAGE
        • SystemAlert.Alerts.NEW_VERSION_OF_HELP_FILE
        • SystemAlert.Alerts.NEW_VERSION_OF_STATIC_FILE
        However, the method doesn't check this.
